name: CondaEnvironment
description: Create and activate a Conda environment.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: environmentName
inputs.label: Environment name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the Conda environment to create and activate.

inputs.name: packageSpecs
inputs.label: Package specs
inputs.helpMarkDown: Space-delimited list of packages to install.

inputs.name: getLatestConda
inputs.label: Update to the latest Conda
inputs.helpMarkDown: Update Conda to the latest version. If the `conda` executable is not found on the system, download and install the latest version of Miniconda. This applies to the Conda installation found in `PATH` or at the path specified by the `CONDA` environment variable.

inputs.name: otherOptions
inputs.label: Other options
inputs.helpMarkDown: Space-delimited list of other options to pass to the `conda` command.

inputs.name: cleanEnvironment
inputs.label: Clean the environment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Delete the environment and recreate it if it already exists. If not selected, the task will reactivate an existing environment.

messages.CleanEnvironment: Found existing environment %s and the task's "Clean environment" parameter is set. Deleting ...
messages.CondaNotFound: The `conda` executable was not found on the system. Set the task's "Update to latest Conda" parameter to download Miniconda, or ask your administrator to install Miniconda or Anaconda.
